div.div: Ethics approval and consent to participate
div.p: The Stockholm Regional Ethical Review Board provided ethical approval (2013/1860â€“31/2). The study was conducted in accordance with the Helsinki Declaration. The conduct and report of the study was guided by the QOREC standards for qualitative research [ 46]. All participants consented in writing to the study and were informed about their rights to withdraw from the study, whereby their contributions would be removed from the analyses.
